title: Passenger Login with Correct Email and Password
description: Verify that a passenger can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the passenger login page
Enter valid email and password credentials
Click the login button
Verify user is successfully authenticated and redirected to the home dashboard displaying upcoming trips, points, and notifications

title: Passenger Login with Incorrect Email or Password
description: Verify that login fails with invalid email or password and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the passenger login page
Enter invalid email or incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that login fails and appropriate error message is displayed

title: Password Reset Workflow for Passenger
description: Verify that the passenger can request a password reset and successfully update the password.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page
Enter registered email and submit password reset request
Verify the reset link or instructions are sent to email (mocked or system simulated)
Navigate to the reset password link or page
Enter new valid password and submit
Verify password is updated and user can log in with the new password

title: Role-Based Access Control for Admin, Operator, and Passenger
description: Verify that different user roles have access permissions limited to their allowed features.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user with valid credentials
Verify admin has access to passenger management, trip management, vouchers, points and backoffice features
Log out and then log in as an operator user
Verify operator can manage trips and assign vouchers and points but has limited passenger account management
Log out and then log in as a passenger user
Verify passenger can only access own trip details, vouchers, points, profile and receive notifications
Attempt to access unauthorized pages with each role
Verify system prevents access and redirects or shows error accordingly

title: Passenger Account Creation by Admin
description: Verify that admins can create a new passenger account through the modal dialog with all required fields.

steps.description: Admin logs into backoffice and opens create passenger modal
Fill in all required passenger information
Submit the passenger creation form
Verify new passenger account is created, visible in the passenger list and persisted

title: Passenger Account Editing by Admin
description: Verify that admins can edit existing passenger details and changes are saved.

steps.description: Admin logs into backoffice and selects a passenger from the list
Open edit passenger modal and modify passenger information
Submit the changes
Verify passenger details are updated and reflected in the list and detailed views

title: Passenger Account Archiving with Confirmation
description: Verify admins can archive passenger accounts and must confirm via a modal before archival.

steps.description: Admin logs in and selects a passenger account
Initiate archive action which opens confirmation modal
Verify confirmation modal content is correct
Confirm archiving
Verify passenger account is marked archived and not visible in active lists

title: Passenger Invitation Workflow
description: Verify admin can send invitations to passengers and handle invitation modal workflows correctly.

steps.description: Admin opens invitation modal
Enter invitee email and details, send invitation
Verify invitation is sent and confirmed by notification
Verify pending invitation appears in passenger management if applicable

title: View Passenger Trip Details: Itinerary, Status, Documents, and Vouchers
description: Verify passengers can view detailed information about their trips including itineraries, current status, documents and vouchers with proper UI updates.

steps.description: Passenger logs in and navigates to MyTrip screen
Verify itinerary items are listed correctly for the trip
Verify trip status shows correctly as upcoming, in progress, or finished
Verify documents linked to the trip are visible
Attempt to download a document
Verify download is initiated successfully
Verify vouchers attached to trip are listed correctly

title: Admin and Operator Trip Management: Create, Update Status, Assign Vouchers and Points
description: Verify internal users can create trips, update trip statuses, and assign vouchers and points to passenger trips.

steps.description: Admin logs in and navigates to trip management section
Create a new trip with required details for a passenger
Verify trip is created and listed correctly
Update trip status from upcoming to in progress, then to finished
Verify status transitions reflect correctly in UI and stored data
Assign vouchers and loyalty points to the passenger's trip
Verify vouchers and points are linked and visible in passenger's trip

title: Points and Rewards Display Accuracy
description: Verify passengers see accurate points balance and origin details in the points and gamification screens.

steps.description: Passenger logs in and navigates to Points screen
Verify total points balance is displayed correctly
Verify detailed points origin and activity history are shown accurately

title: Navigation Components Responsiveness and Visibility
description: Verify that header, sidebar, and bottom navigation components render correctly and respond appropriately for different screen sizes and user interactions.

steps.description: Access the app on desktop viewport
Verify header, sidebar, and bottom navigation are visible and functional
Resize viewport to mobile screen size
Verify navigation adjusts to mobile-first design and all navigation links are accessible
Click navigation links and verify page loads correctly

title: Profile Management: Update Personal Details
description: Verify users can update and save their personal information via profile management screens.

steps.description: User logs in and navigates to Profile screen
Modify personal details such as name, contact info, and preferences
Submit the changes
Verify details are saved and reflected immediately after save

title: System Notifications Generation and Visibility for Key Events
description: Verify system generates notifications for defined events (trip status change, account action etc.) and notifications are visible on dashboard and relevant screens.

steps.description: Trigger key events such as trip status update or account change (simulate or perform action as admin/operator)
Verify notification is generated in the system
Passenger logs in and views dashboard
Verify notifications are visible and accurate regarding event details

title: Session Persistence After Login and Secure Logout
description: Verify user sessions persist across page refreshes and proper logout clears session securely.

steps.description: Log in as a user and navigate through app
Refresh the browser page
Verify user remains logged in and session persists
Log out
Verify session is cleared and user is redirected to login page
Attempt to access a protected page without login
Verify access is denied and redirected to login

title: Handling Edge Cases in Trip Status Transitions
description: Verify the system handles unusual transitions such as skipping statuses or reverting to previous trip status correctly.

steps.description: Admin attempts to change trip status directly from upcoming to finished
Verify system allows or blocks the invalid transition with appropriate message
Admin attempts to revert trip status from finished back to in progress
Verify system handles status reversion according to business rules or rejects with explanation

title: Validation and Error Handling on Passenger Creation and Editing Forms
description: Verify all required fields have validations and error messages appear for invalid or missing inputs during passenger creation and editing.

steps.description: Open create passenger modal and leave required fields empty
Attempt to submit form
Verify validation messages prevent submission
Enter invalid data formats (e.g., bad email format)
Verify proper error messages appear
Repeat for edit passenger modal
